mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `servicinginfo` AS s INNER JOIN `typeinfo` AS tt ON s.`infoid` = tt.`infoid` INNER JOIN `type` AS t ON tt.`typeid` = t.`typeid` WHERE tt.`infoid` = #{infoid}

SELECT so.`infoid`,s.`smid`,cr.carnumber,m.`motorcyclename`,cd.`brandname`,md.`motorid`,md.`motorname`,sf.staffname,c.`username`,cr.`drivername`,cr.`driverphone`,cr.`carcourse`,s.`starttime`,s.`entime`,s.`countprice`,c.`userremark`,s.`consumermark` FROM `servicingmain` AS s INNER JOIN `servicinginfo` AS so ON s.`smid` = so.`smid` INNER JOIN `typeinfo` AS t ON so.`infoid` = t.`infoid` INNER JOIN `staff` AS sf ON s.`staffid` = sf.`staffid` INNER JOIN `consumercar` AS cr ON s.consumerid = cr.consumerid INNER JOIN `consumerinfo` AS c ON cr.`userid` = c.`userid` INNER JOIN `motorcycle` AS m ON cr.`motorcycleid` = m.`motorcycleid` INNER JOIN `carbrand` AS cd ON m.`brandid` = cd.`brandid` INNER JOIN `motorbrand` AS md ON m.`motorid` = md.`motorid` WHERE s.`smid` = #{smid}
